name: TXT (TOMORROW X TOGETHER)
description: TOMORROW X TOGETHER (Hangul: 투모로우바이투게더; read as Tomorrow by Together; commonly known as TXT) is a five-member boy group under Big Hit Music. They are a bright and youthful boyband aiming to become the next global breakthrough artist. They debuted on March 4, 2019 with their first mini album The Dream Chapter: STAR. The band consists of Soobin, Yeonjun, Beomgyu, Taehyun and Huening Kai. Their fandom name is called MOA (모아) which stands for "Moments of Alwaysness". In Korean, MOA means to "gather/collect".
